tuv.seg: There were 2 temporary mechanisms set up for providing funding to member states which were experiencing economic difficulties – the European Financial Stabilisation Mechanism and the European Financial Stability Facility

Rinneadh dhá mheicníocht shealadacha a shocrú chun cistiú a sholáthar do bhallstáit a bhí thíos le deacrachtaí geilleagracha – an Sásra Eorpach um Chobhsaíocht Airgeadais agus an tSaoráid Eorpach um Chobhsaíocht Airgeadais
Both were established in 2010 and both provided loans to Ireland under the IMF/EU Memorandum of Understanding with Ireland
Bunaíodh an dá cheann in 2010 agus sholáthair siad iasachtaí d’Éirinn faoi Mheabhrán Tuisceana an IMF/AE le hÉirinn
(Under this arrangement, Ireland also received loans from the IMF and bilateral loans from some non-euro member states – in particular, the UK)
(Faoi socrú seo, thug an IMF iasachtaí d’Éirinn chomh maith, agus thug roinnt ballstáit neamheuro iasachtaí d’Éirinn – an RA ach go háirithe)
A permanent mechanism – the European Stability Mechanism - was established in October 2012
Bunaíodh meicníocht bhuan – an Sásra Cobhsaíochta Eorpach – i nDeireadh Fómhair 2012
These 3 funding mechanisms are usually described as “bail-out” mechanisms
Is gnách go ndéantar cur síos ar na 3 mheicníocht chistithe seo mar mheicníochtaí “tarrthála”
European Financial Stabilisation Mechanism
An Sásra Eorpach um Chobhsaíocht Airgeadais
The European Financial Stabilisation Mechanism (EFSM) was created by the European Council in 2010
Chruthaigh Comhairle na hEorpa an Sásra Eorpach um Chobhsaíocht Airgeadais (EFSM) in 2010
It was established under Regulation (EU) No 407/2010 of 11 May 2010
Bunaíodh é faoi Rialachán (AE) Uimh. 407/2010 an 11 Bealtaine 2010 (pdf)
The regulation gave the European Commission the power to contract borrowings on behalf of the EU in order to fund loans to the euro countries that need them
Thug an rialachán seo an chumhacht don Choimisiún Eorpach iasachtaí a chonrú thar ceann an AE d’fhonn iasachtaí a chistiú do na tíortha euro óna dteastaíonn siad
It was designed as a temporary mechanism which might be available to provide loans to member states that were having severe financial or economic problems
Dearadh é mar mheicníocht shealadach a d’fhéadfadh bheith ar fáil chun iasachtaí a sholáthar do bhallstáit a bhí thíos le deacrachtaí tromchúiseacha nó le fadhbanna geilleagracha
Further information on the EFSM is available on the European Commission’s website
Tá fáil ar bhreis faisnéise ar an EFSM ar láithreán gréasáin an Choimisiúin Eorpaigh
European Financial Stability Facility
An tSaoráid Eorpach um Chobhsaíocht Airgeadais
The European Financial Stability Facility (EFSF) is a company which was established by the countries that share the euro
Cuideachta atá sa tSaoráid Eorpach um Chobhsaíocht Airgeadais (EFSF) a bhunaigh na tíortha a úsáideann an euro
It was incorporated in Luxembourg in June 2010
Rinneadh iad a chorprú i Lucsamburg i Meitheamh 2010
The shareholders are the member states who use the euro
Is iad na ballstáit a úsáideann an euro na scairshealbhóirí
The EFSF’s aim was to provide temporary financial assistance to any euro area member state that needed it
Ba é cuspóir an EFSF chun cúnamh sealadach airgeadais a thabhairt d’aon bhallstát limistéar an euro ónar theastaigh sé
Since 1 July 2013, the EFSF can no longer engage in new financing programmes or enter into new loan facility agreements
Ón 1 Iúil 2013 i leith, ní féidir leis an EFSF tabhairt faoi chláir nua mhaoinithe ná iontráil i gcomhaontaithe nua saoráid iasachta a thuilleadh
It continues to finance programmes that were started before the establishment of the European Stability Mechanism
Leanann siad le cláir a mhaoiniú a tosaíodh roimh bhunú an Sásra Eorpaigh um Chobhsaíocht Airgeadais
Further information is available on the EFSF website
Tá fáil ar bhreis faisnéise ar láithreán gréasáin an EFSF
The European Stability Mechanism (ESM) is the permanent crisis mechanism to safeguard financial stability in the euro area (the permanent bail-out mechanism)
Is é an Sásra Cobhsaíochta Eorpach (ESM) an mheicníocht bhuan ghéarchéime atá in ainm is cobhsaíocht airgeadais i limistéar an euro a chosaint (an mheicníocht bhuan tarrthála)
It was established in October 2012 following ratification of the Treaty Establishing the ESM by all 17 euro area member states
Bunaíodh é i nDeireadh Fómhair 2012 tar éis gur dhaingnigh gach ceann de 17 mballstát limistéar an euro an Conradh lena mbunaítear an ESM
The ESM treaty refers to the Fiscal Stability Treaty and provides that assistance from the ESM is dependent on the country concerned having ratified the Fiscal Stability Treaty
Déanann Conradh an ESM tagairt don Chonradh um Chobhsaíocht Fhioscach agus ní sholáthraítear an cúnamh sin ón ESM ach do thíortha a dhaingnigh an Conradh um Chobhsaíocht Fhioscach
Ireland ratified the ESM treaty by means of legislation
Dhaingnigh Éire an Conradh ESM trí reachtaíocht a chur i dtoll a chéile
The ESM’s Board of Governors is made up of the finance ministers of euro area member states and is chaired by the President of the Eurogroup
Is éard atá i mBord Rialtóirí an ESM ná na hairí airgeadais de chuid limistéar an euro agus feidhmíonn Uachtarán Eurogroup mar chathaoirleach air
It has its headquarters in Luxembourg
Tá a gceanncheathrú suite i Lucsamburg
The ESM provides help to euro area member states who are having financial difficulties
Soláthraíonn an ESM cabhair do bhallstáit limistéar an euro atá thíos le deacrachtaí airgeadais
The help is subject to various conditions in respect of economic and fiscal management
Bíonn an chabhair faoi réir coinníollacha éagsúla maidir le bainistíocht gheilleagrach agus fhioscach
Further information is available on the ESM website
Tá fáil ar bhreis faisnéise ar láithreán gréasáin an ESM
